translation: napój [formal; a drink of any type]
sentence: Hot beverages include tea, coffee, and hot chocolate.

translation: kulić się [to lower your head or body in fear, often while moving backwards]
sentence: Stop cowering! I'm not going to hit you.

translation: nieomylność [the fact of never being wrong, failing, or making a mistake]
sentence: His stubborn belief in his own infallibility kept him from listening to others.

translation: posłuszność, hołd [formal; the fact of obeying or respecting someone, or something you do that expresses this]
sapać [to breathe quickly and loudly through your mouth, usually because you have been doing something very energetic]
sentence: Matteo arrived at the top of the hill, panting and covered in sweat.

translation: na temat [formal; relating directly to the subject being considered]
sentence: Please keep your comments pertinent to the topic under discussion.

translation: zdobyć [formal; to get something, especially after an effort]
sentence: She's managed somehow to procure his phone number.

translation: uderzyć, dać klapsa [to hit someone with the flat, inside part of your hand]
sentence: I'll smack your bottom if you don't behave yourself.

translation: spadać, staczać się [to fall quickly and without control]
sentence: I lost my footing and tumbled down the stairs.

translation: wafel [a very thin, dry biscuit that is often sweet]
sentence: The sundae was topped with chocolate and a wafer.
